MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: CD/DVD eject, REV eject, Quikstor eject, commandline, command line, batch, scripts, scripting, cd/dvd ejecting tools, REV ejecting tools, commandline ejecting tools, Quikstor ejecting tool, ejecting from command line, removable media eject
English.Char_Desc_80: Removable media ejecting utility. Used with scripts, programs, batch files.
English.Char_Desc_250: FreeEject is a free, light-weight utility used to eject removable media such as REV, DVD/CD and Quikstor by simply specifying the drive letter associated with the media. It is run via command line and can be used within scripts, programs and batch .
English.Char_Desc_450: FreeEject is a free, light-weight utility used to eject removable media such as REV, DVD/CD and Quikstor by simply specifying the drive letter associated with the media. It is run via command line and can be used within scripts, programs and batch files.
English.Char_Desc_2000: FreeEject is a free, light-weight utility used to eject removable media such as REV, DVD/CD and Quikstor by simply specifying the drive letter associated with the media. It is run via command line and can be used within scripts, programs and batch files.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This product can be freely distributed through the Internet. To put it onto a CD, contact support@freeeject.com
